verses.name: James 2:14
verses.text: What doth it profit, my brethren, though a man say he hath faith, and have not works? can faith save him?

verses.name: James 2:15
verses.text: If a brother or sister be naked, and destitute of daily food,

verses.name: James 2:16
verses.text: And one of you say unto them, Depart in peace, be ye warmed and filled; notwithstanding ye give them not those things which are needful to the body; what doth it profit?

verses.name: James 2:17
verses.text: Even so faith, if it hath not works, is dead, being alone.
